basic_info.name: Arjun College of Technology Admissions
description: Undergraduate students are admitted based on their 12th standard scores. The admissions are done through both government quota through Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions Counselling (TNEA Counselling) and management quota.

basic_info.name: Arjun College of Technology Placements
description: Arjun College of Technology placement cell is very active and gives a lot of placement opportunities to the students of the Institute. Some recruiting companies of Arjun College of Technology are HCL, TVS, Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Accenture, TATA, Cognizant, and Titan.

basic_info.name: Arjun College of Technology Scholarships
description: Arjun College of Technology offers various scholarships and eligible State and Central Government scholarships. The Arjun Educational Trust offers various scholarships for the students based on their performance in the university examination every year. As per Tamil Nadu Government and Anna University norms.

basic_info.name: Arjun College of Technology Faculty
description: Arjun College of Technology has well trained and highly experienced faculty. Dr.R.Suresh Kumar is the Principal of the institute.

Section.name: About Arjun College of Technology
Section.description:
Arjun College of Technology was established in 2013 as part of the Arjun Group of Concerns. An ISO 9001:2015 Certified Institution.The college is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to the Anna University, Chennai. College has accreditation from NAAC - UGC and NBA - AICTE, New Delhi.
The college offers full time on campus two courses. All courses are affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. Admissions in the courses offered by Arjun College of Technology is based on an entrance examination called TNEA (Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions Counselling).
Table of Content
3.1 How to Apply?
The college offers courses in Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) and Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) . All courses are affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. Here are some details about the courses tabulated below.
Duration- 4 years Eligibility- 10+2 with 50% + TNEA Specializations: Artificial Intelligence

Ques. How far is Arjun College of Technology from Coimbatore City?
Ans. The college is located at Thamaraikulam.It is located at about 25 km from Coimbatore City and 10 kilometres from Pollachi.

Ques. Is there any age limit for application of TNEA examination?
Ans. Yes, there is an age limit for the TNEA examination.
The minimum age of the candidates should be 18 years.
The maximum age of applicants should be 25 years.

faqs.question: How far is Arjun College of Technology from Coimbatore City?
faqs.answer: Ans.The college is located at Thamaraikulam.It is located at about 25 km from Coimbatore City and 10 kilometres from Pollachi.

faqs.question: What are the category wise eligibility marks for the admission in Arjun College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.The Eligibility Marks for the Admissions, the Marks secured by the Students in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics in HSC are as followsOBC - 50% (General Category)BC - 45% ,SC & ST - 40%

faqs.question: What are the cutoff marks for fee concession?
faqs.answer: Ans.Here are the details of cutoff marks for fee concession.If Cut off Marks in + 2(HSC) examination are191 and above, 100 % fee concession will be given including Hostel or Transport Fee.181- 190, 75 % fee concession will be given including Hostel or Transport Fee.176 - 180, 50 % fee concession will be given including Tuition Fee.

faqs.question: Is there any age limit for application of TNEA examination?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, there is an age limit for the TNEA examination.The minimum age of the candidates should be 18 years.The maximum age of applicants should be 25 years.
